dmca.title: Infringement complaint
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Kelly Green [mailto:kelly_484@yahoo.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, November 29, 2006 2:43 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Infringement complaint
Subject: Infringement complaint


To: Andrea Almeida, Associate General Counsel

It has come to my attention that a website you are hosting has posted my
personal information. The domain is pureserendipity.com. I am the former
owner of the domain, and it appears that someone has recently bought it
and reposted all of my old personal website content back onto it. As you
can see, the person has even posted my email address back onto the site.
The entirety of the content on that domain right now belongs to me. 

It is my good faith belief that the use of this material has not been
authorized by me in any way. I assert that the information in this
notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that that I am
the owner of this intellectual property, and thus authorized to act on
an exclusive right that it is allegedly infringed.

I ask that you please remove this content from pureserendipity.com

Sincerely, 
Kelly Green (I certify that this is an electronic signature)
936 Heights Blvd. Apt. #3
Houston, TX 77008
Cell phone - 832-434-1719
Email: kelly_484@yahoo.com
